item.title: License
item.description: LICENSE Unless otherwise mentioned code from this blog can used as per MIT or Apache 2.0 license.

rdata.lu rData.lu ☰ HOME VISUALIZATION CATEGORIES CONTACT ABOUT US -- -- CONTACT Rdata.lu is a Luxembourg based company specializing in data science training and expertise. We mainly use R environment to build applications. We collaborate with small and large businesses in different kind of industries.

rdata.lu rData.lu ☰ HOME VISUALIZATION CATEGORIES CONTACT ABOUT US -- -- SHINY APPLICATIONS TYPE OF VEHICLES FUEL Interactive dashboard to compare the number of vehicles by type of fuel in Luxembourg, 1997-2017. STEEL TRANSPORTATION Animated graph showing the quantity of Luxembourg steel moved by road transportation to a destination country, 1952-2000.
